name: ShapeOperation
shortdesc: Specifies how to combine the shapes if the destination image already has a selection.

property.name: SHAPEXOR
property.shortdesc: Replaces the shape in the destination image with the loaded selection.

property.name: SHAPEINTERSECT
property.shortdesc: The resulting shape is the area of intersection between the two shapes.

property.name: SHAPESUBTRACT
property.shortdesc: Subtracts the loaded shape from the selection is the destination image.
